name: Not Your Usual "Before and After" Online Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
You will be given a list of words- like "tail, tom, bird." Figure out what word, paired with each of these words, makes a phrase or compound word- in this case, it's "cat" (cattail, tomcat, catbird.) Now choose the word from the list that ALSO makes a phrase or compound word with that word- for example, if the list is: 
wind
fish
storm
berry
you would choose "fish" because it goes with "cat" to make "catfish." 
Got it? OK, here is your first clue! 
Sky, waves, spot
questions.explanation:
Pilot.

	The word in common is "light." Skylight, light waves, spotlight, pilot light.

Olive.

	The word in common is "green." Greenhouse, putting green, greenback, olive green.

Order.

	The word in common is "money." Funny money, money tree, old money, money order.

Branding.

	The word in common is "iron." Iron will, Iron Age, tire iron, branding iron.

Back.

	The word in common is "paper." Paper doll, rice paper, wallpaper, paperback.

George.

	The word in common is "bush." Rose bush, bushbaby, bushwhack, George Bush.

Drinking.

	The word in common is "water." Salt water, water meter, waterfall, drinking water.

Forest.

	The word in common is "fire." Foxfire, fire ant, firefighter, forest fire.

Magic.

	The word in common is "spell." Cool spell, spellbound, dry spell, magic spell.

Race.

	The word in common is "horse." Sawhorse, horse chestnut, horseshoe, horse race.
